ygData.subject: Lullaby/Pixie Testing
ygData.msgSnippet: Apology to those of you have seen this - I just found it (via link from Backstage at the Concert Hall)... Hopefully we ll hear something by the end of the
ygData.messageBody:
Apology to those of you have seen this - I just found it (via link from
Backstage at the Concert Hall)...

Hopefully we'll hear something by the end of the week...


Slyde


EsterTheTester
Station Member posted 08-26-2000 01:41 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Guys I'm not the one looking in the code. One of our programmers is on
vacation and one of the other ones is about to run and hide every time I
come upstairs.
Unfortunately it is not as simple as "ok let me search for bard song xxx"
our code base is huge and complicated. I don't have access or authority to
run searches there.

Our programmers have a LOT of stuff on their plate so please be paitent with
them.

We are patching on either Wed or Thurs. After everything is finished for
this patch the programmers will have some more time to look at all the
things I've been asking and asking and asking.

I am sorry this is taking a while. No one is intentionally blowing off
Bards. Bards are the number one fix in the Testing Department, but honestly
we're also trying to verify new content. No I'm not hiding anything, I'm not
trying to let anyone down 'easy' but these things don't happen overnight.

I will make sure that on Friday at the _latest_ the programmer in charge of
this and I sit down and try to figure out the lulaby resist rates. Thursday
during the patch if he as time.
